data.name: GetUser
data.value: Select UserId, UserTypeId, FirstName, LastName, EmailId, Password from [UnicoVehicle].[user].[User] where DeletedDate is null

data.name: GetUserbyId
data.value: Select UserTypeId, FirstName, LastName, EmailId, Password from [UnicoVehicle].[user].[User] where DeletedDate is null and UserId = @userId

data.name: InsertUser
data.value: Insert into [UnicoVehicle].[user].[User] (UserTypeId, FirstName, LastName, EmailId, Password, CreatedDate) values (@userTypeId, @firstName, @lastName, @emailId, @password, @createdDate)

data.name: UpdateUser
data.value: Update [UnicoVehicle].[user].[User] set FirstName = @firstName, LastName = @lastName, EmailId = @emailId, Password = @password, ModifiedDate = @modifiedDate where UserId = @userId

data.name: GetCustomer
data.value: Select CustomerId, UserId, DistrictId, Address, Photograph, DrivingLicenseNumber, StandardIDNumber, IncomeTaxIDNumber, LastITReturn, BankPassbookPhoto from [UnicoVehicle].[user].[Customer] where DeletedDate is null

data.name: GetCustomerbyId
data.value: Select UserId, DistrictId, Address, Photograph, DrivingLicenseNumber, StandardIDNumber, IncomeTaxIDNumber, LastITReturn, BankPassbookPhoto from [UnicoVehicle].[user].[Customer] where DeletedDate is null and CustomerId = @customerId

data.name: InsertCustomer
data.value: Insert into [UnicoVehicle].[user].[Customer] (UserId, DistrictId, Address, Photograph, DrivingLicenseNumber, StandardIDNumber, IncomeTaxIDNumber, LastITReturn, BankPassbookPhoto, CreatedDate) values (@userId, @districtId, @address, @photograph, @drivingLicenseNumber, @standardIDNumber, @incomeTaxIDNumber, @lastITReturn, @bankPassbookPhoto, @createdDate)

data.name: UpdateCustomer
data.value: Update [UnicoVehicle].[user].[Customer] set DistrictId = @districtId, Address = @address, Photograph = @photograph, DrivingLicenseNumber = @drivingLicenseNumber, LastITReturn = @lastITReturn, BankPassbookPhoto = @bankPassbookPhoto, ModifiedDate = @modifiedDate where CustomerId = @customerId
